name: venturesutra
tag_list: startup, angels, startup-funding, enterpreneurship, angel-investor, venture-capital, vc, early-stage-investing
overview:
Early stage dealflow platform

Venturesutra is a DealFlow Management platform for angels and venture Capital to connect with entrepreneurs and evaluate their early stage funding plans. Venturesutra provides a simple and powerful tool for investors and entrepreneur to efficiently manage the funding process in the Early Stage of business cycle.

Venturesutra seeks to fill the existing gap between investors and entrepreneurs in the early stage investment space. Investors often find it difficult to source quality deals and maintain a regular dealflow and start up entrepreneurs often struggle to find the right investors directly. At Venturesutra, investors can not only access funding applications by entrepreneurs through a public window but can create proprietary deals through their very own private window. Entrepreneurs can search investors on the platform and share their applications with select investors or with the larger investor community.
